app.name: Alist
app.description: A file list program that supports multiple storage systems (e.g., Google Drive, OneDrive, S3, FTP, WebDAV).

PUID.label: User ID (PUID)
PUID.description: The User ID (PUID) to run Alist as.

PGID.label: Group ID (PGID)
PGID.description: The Group ID (PGID) to run Alist as.

ADMIN_PASSWORD.label: Admin Initial Password
ADMIN_PASSWORD.description: Sets the initial password for the admin user. Change this immediately after the first login!
